title: Ep. - 370 - EXECUTIVE PRODUCER OF LFG EXECUTIVE PRODUCERS OF EPSTEIN’S SHADOW: GHISLAINE MAXWELL
description:
LFG is a no-holds-barred, inside account of the U.S. women’s national team’s ongoing fight for equal pay as told by Megan Rapinoe, Jessica McDonald, Becky Sauerbrunn, Kelley O’Hara, Sam Mewis and others. Executive Producer Abby Greensfelder is the founder and CEO of Everywoman Studios, a full-service media company with a mission to tell female-focused, female-driven stories creating positive cultural impact. 

 

Executive Producers Barbara Shearer and Nina Burleigh of Peacock TV’s “Epstein’s Shadow: Ghislaine Maxwell” the three-part documentary series investigation into the British socialite, Ghislaine Maxwell, known for her association with financier and convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, as she awaits trial on multiple sex trafficking charges. 

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://cameo.com/katecasey

Twitter: https://twitter.com/katecasey

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/katecaseyca

Clubhouse: @katecasey

Amazon.com: www.amazon.com/shop/katecasey
